name: Bone Pickaxe
description: After Hunt phase setup, place the Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Bone Darts
description: Range: 6. Frail: When you attempt tp wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Axe
description: Frail. Savage: Once per attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. This effect does not apply to impervious hit locations.

name: Bone Club
description: Cumbersome: Spend Movement as an additional cost to activate this weapon. Ignore Cumbersome if this weapon is activated indirectly (Pounce, Charge, etc).

name: Bone Blade
description: Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

name: Bone Dagger
description: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival. Perfect hit: An attack roll result of a lantern 10.

name: Bone Sickle
description: After the Hunt phase setup, place the Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.

name: Round Leather Shield
description: Add 1 (shield) to all  hit locations. Block 1: Spend (flash) to ignore 1 hit the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

name: Hunter Whip
description: (puzzle blue)(puzzle blue) On a Perfect hit, discard 1 mood in play.

name: Rawhide Whip
description: Provoke: When you wound with this weapon, gain the priority target token.

name: Claw Head Arrow
description: Slow, Ammo - Bow: You must have a bow in your gear grid to activate this. If you hit, monster gains -1 evasion token. Use once per showdown.

name: Cat Gut Bow
description: Cumbersome, Range: 6. Aim: When you attack, before rolling to hit, you may reduce the speed of this weapon by 1 to gain +2 accuracy for that attack.

name: Cat Fang Knife
description: (square red)(square red)(square red) On a Perfect hit, gain +1 strength token. When knocked down, remove all your +1 strength tokens.

name: Lion Beast Katar
description: Deadly: +1 luck with this weapon. Paired: When you attack, add the speed of a second Lion Beast Katar in your gear grid.

name: King Spear
description: Reach 2: May attack from 2 space away.

name: Whistling Mace
description: On a Perfect hit, reveal the next AI card. Place it on top or bottom of the AI deck. Unwieldy: If any attack roll results are 1, you hit yourself and suffer 1 damage.

name: Rainbow Katana
description: Frail

name: Finger of God
description: Reach 2.

name: Zanbato
description: Slow, Frail, Deadly

name: Counterweighted Axe
description: Reach 2

name: Scrap Sword
description: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +4 strength fro the rest of the attack.

name: Scrap Dagger
description: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +2 strength fro the rest of the attack.

name: Skullcap Hammer
description: On a Perfect hit, the monster is dazed, and gains -1 speed token until the end of its turn. A Monster can be dazed once per round.

name: Founding Stone
description: Spend (flash) to sling the stone from anywhere on the board! Archive this card for 1 automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound. Archive: Return the card to the game box.

name: Oxidized Ring Whip
description: Sharp, Reach 2. (puzzle blue)(square red)(square red)(square red) Gains Provoke (see Rawhide Whip).

name: Oxidized Lantern Sword
description: Sharp. Deflect 1: Spend (flash), you now have exactly 1 deflect token. The next 1 time you are hit, ignore that hit and lose 1 deflect token.

name: Oxidized Lantern Glaive
description: Sharp, Reach 2. (puzzle blue)(square red) On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. This weapon gains +4 strength for this attack.

name: Oxidized Lantern Dagger
description: Sharp, Paired. (puzzle red)(square red) On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival.

name: Oxidized Beacon Shield
description: Add (shieldtwo) to all hit locations. Deflect 2: Spend (flash), you now have exactly 2 deflect tokens. The next 2 times you are hit, ignore a hit and lose 1 deflect token.

name: Butcher Cleaver
description: Paired. Sentient: Must be insane to activate. Irreplaceable: When you die, archive this card.

name: Thunder Maul
description: Irreplaceable, Unique, Cursed. On a Perfect hit, the monster is knocked down. Suffer a severe arm injury. All non-deaf survivors suffer 1 brain damage.

name: Lantern Halberd
description: Reach 2, Irreplaceable, Unique. After attacking, if standing, you may move up to 2 spaces directly away from the monster.

name: Muramasa
description: Frail, Sharp, Sentient, Deadly 2, Unique. When you critically wound with this weapon, gain 2 bleeding tokens.

name: Adventure Sword
description: Unique, Irreplaceable. Your courage is added to this weapon's strength.

name: Steel Shield
description: Irreplaceable. -3 movement. Spend (flash) or 1 survival to ignore a hit.

name: Steel Sword
description: Irreplaceable, Slow, Sharp. On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +1d10 strength for the rest of the attack.

name: Twilight Sword
description: Slow, Cursed, Cumbersome, Sentient, Irreplaceable. Gains Devastating 2 when fighting the Watcher. *Accuracy is 9 - Twilight Sword proficiency level.

name: Dragon Slayer
description: Frail, Slow, Sharp, Devastating 1. Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Perfect Slayer
description: Slow, Sharp, Devastating 2, Irreplaceable. -2 movement.

name: Scrap Shield
description: Add (shieldone) to all hit locations. Block 1: Spend (flash) to ignore a hit the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

name: Lantern Dagger
description: Paired. Sharp: Add 1d10 Strength to each wound attempt. Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Lantern Sword
description: Sharp: Add 1d10 Strength to each wound attempt. Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Lantern Glaive
description: Reach 2. Sharp: Add 1d10 Strength to each wound attempt. Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Ring Whip
description: Sharp, Reach 2. Early Iron: When an attack roll result is 1, cancel any hits and end the attack.

name: Beacon Shield
description: Add (shieldtwo) to all hit locations. Block 2: Spend (flash) to ignore 2 hits the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

name: Bone Knuckle
description: Paired. When you wound with this weapon, monster gains -1 toughness until end of the attack.

name: Lance of Longinus
description: Irreplaceable, Reach 2. Each showdown, the first time you wound, the monster gains a -1 toughness token.

name: Hollow Sword
description: Frail, Paired. On a Perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.

name: Hollowpoint Arrow
description: Slow, Ammo - Bow. On a hit, monster gains -1 movement token. Use once per showdown.

name: Sonic Tomahawk
description: On a Perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll. (puzzle red)(square green)(square green)(square blue) Gain Savage and Paired.

name: Feather Shield
description: Block 1. (square green)(square red)(square blue) Reduce any suffered brain damage by 1 to a minimum of 1.

name: Arc Bow
description: Slow, Ranged 6. Cumbersome: Spend (horse) as an additional cost of activating this weapon. (puzzle red)(puzzle green)(square blue) Range +2.
